overview: A down-trodden warehouse worker commands the forces of evil to do his bidding. Training the flesh-eating ghouls to devour those that stand in his way to becoming a "normal" citizen of society. But, will his thirst for vengeance be enough to control the group of demons' ever growing thirst for human flesh?
tagline: One Socially Inept Geek Controls These Demons... Do Not Piss Him Off!
title: They Must Eat!
